spec_data.Name: perl-Pod-Plainer
spec_data.Description:
Pod::Plainer uses Pod::Parser which takes Pod with the (new) 'C<< .. >>'
constructs and returns the old(er) style with just 'C<>'; '<' and '>' are
replaced by 'E<lt>' and 'E<gt>'.
This can be used to pre-process Pod before using tools which do not
recognize the new style Pods.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:16:12 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl extension for converting Pod to old-style Pod
